title: League client will not open.
body:
As of 3 days ago, I've had this problem with trying to open the league client, seeing the logo, and then having it just completely disappear. I have reinstalled this game multiple times throughout the past days with no change in the results. I've looked at older threads and the answers there do not help my case.
Any other help would be appreciated.

replies.body: Looking at the processes tab in task manager, league just dies after a couple seconds into trying to load it up.

Sounds like your League might have updated and doesn't have all the right permissions in place for it to open correctly. Should be easy to fix by running it as admin and going through the steps in the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)!

I had the same issue and idk how it opened, I don't think League is supposed to take an hour (at least in my case) to open a "Restart needed to update" screen. Perhaps it was already opening but in that case it would have had the pop up saying "League is already open do you want to close the first window" or something like that. I guess my computer can't handle league opening despite it doing so many times before. Regardless I hope your client doesn't do this thing again.
